mapper.insert: insert into vacation values(seq_vacation.nextval, #{m_no}, #{lec_no}, #{vacation_title}, #{reason}, #{start_date}, #{date_count}, sysdate, default, null, default, default )
mapper.select: select v.* ,title, m.name from vacation v , lecture l, member m where v.lec_no = l.lec_no and v.m_no = m.m_no order by v.v_no desc
select v.*, m.name from vacation v , member m where v_no=#{v_no} and v.m_no = m.m_no
select v.* ,title ,name from vacation v , lecture l, member m where v.lec_no = l.lec_no and v.m_no = m.m_no and l.m_no= #{m_no} and tstatus='N' order by l.lec_no desc
